greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: LCM of numbers <= n and having a factor in common with n.
comment: If n is not composite then a(n) = n.
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{a = 1, k = 2}, While[k < n + 1, If[ GCD[k, n] > 1, a = LCM[a, k]]; k++ ]; Return[a]]; Table[ f[n], {n, 1, 45} ]
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Dec 19 2001
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 26 2001
